::DrillBit::

"Dark Mouse did something that brought her back. I didn't ask questions.
Anyway I have re-newed the ingagement. And well... um.....
I would like you to be my best man."
He gets the message from Killfest.
"Hold on, I'll have Dark Mouse do it."
He opens a comm to DM.
"Mouse, Killfest needs to be let in."
He then looks back to StarScream, for an answer.
